name.en: Frenzied Panda of the Bamboo Forest
name.ja: <ruby>竹<rt>ちく</rt></ruby><ruby>林<rt>りん</rt></ruby>のキラーパンダ

requirement.en: Send 1 face-up Beast Type Effect Monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Beast Type non-Effect Monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. If you Special Summoned "Super War-Lion" by this effect, you can destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field.
